item.title: microsoft released vs2017 enterpirse
item.author: chennqqi@qq.com (chennqqi)
item.description: 2016/11/16 Microsoft released vistual studio 2017 RC version. I tried to install(windows7), but failed. I’m excited about this version. But maybe wait some time until it’s stable. 今晚VS2017 RC将携Visual Studio for Mac 2017预览版亮相 download vs2017 here https://www.visualstudio.com/

item.title: VisualStudio 断点不生效分析
item.author: chennqqi@qq.com (chennqqi)
item.description:
问题分析:

调试程序需要程序携带了调试信息。

widnows下调试信息为pdb文件。

无法调试或者断点不生效就是以下原因
